alert.note: Alert for Elk; McKean (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 9:28PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL ELK AND MCKEAN COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM EDT... At 928 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Allegany State Park to near Ridgway. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bradford, Kane, Allegany State Park, Port Allegany, Smethport, Wetmore, Betula, Wilcox, James City, Rew, Coryville, Crosby, Cyclone, Marshburg, Westline, Kinzua Bridge State Park, Mount Jewett, Eldred, Lewis Run and University Of Pittsburgh - Bradford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for north central Pennsylvania.
